name: Do Select
description: We are market leaders in the skill assessment space, and our goal is to match every individual to a relevant opportunity, all using DoSelect skill data. DoSelect was founded in 2015 with the goal of providing decision makers with skill intelligence to help them make data-driven decisions throughout the employment lifecycle. With our solutions, we now assist over 4000 organizations in overcoming their most complex human capital challenges.
features: Full stack and project-based evaluations with dedicated IDE.
insight-rich reports with code quality scores, deep code analysis, and performance insights.
Assess test takers in an AI enabled proctored environment.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Make smarter people decisions using skill data
ShortDescription: Skill assessments and Hackathons. Now deployed by the likes of Capgemini, Razorpay, Postman, Sapient, Edgeverve, Fractal Analytics and PhonePe etc.
enhanced_description: DoSelect is a market leader in the skill assessment space, founded in 2015, with the core mission to match individuals to relevant opportunities using comprehensive skill data. The platform provides decision-makers with skill intelligence to enable data-driven decisions throughout the entire employment lifecycle. DoSelect offers a robust solution for technical evaluations, including full-stack and project-based assessments, featuring a dedicated Integrated Development Environment (IDE). It delivers insight-rich reports that include detailed code quality scores, deep code analysis, and performance insights. Furthermore, the platform ensures assessment integrity by utilizing an AI-enabled proctored environment. DoSelect currently assists over 4000 organizations in overcoming complex human capital challenges and is trusted by prominent companies such as Capgemini, Razorpay, Postman, Sapient, Edgeverve, Fractal Analytics, and PhonePe.
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive insight-rich reports including code quality and deep analysis
roi_benefits: Smarter people decisions based on skill data
